thread.title: Allan Iverson
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Allan Iverson

author: Allan Iverson
title: Allan Iverson
text:
.to hell with this faker. I have no sympathy for trump voters for whom things just 'aren't working out'.
You created this mess. We tossed you the keys to the whole damned thing: Congress, Senate, President. "Don't wreck it", we said.
So what do you do? Alienate allies and not-so-allies alike, enflame the minority groups that make this country great. Act like a Buffoon when you could have effected real enduring change across the planet, enshrining your name in history. Instead, your family will forevermore be known as Mudd.
No quantity of money and time can insulate you. You are Gregor Samsa! HAHAHA!
